page.title: 16Private Housing in Windsor.
page.content: West Windsor is a very{expensive {place to live}in. The houses cost a lot of money because there are a{lot {of jobs}in the area and because{travel {is so easy.}There is the M4 to London, a{good train service}and{Heathrow {Airport}is nearby. Most of the houses were built in the 1960's and 1970's. They cost between {Â£40000}for a terraced house with two bedrooms to{Â£100000}for a detached house with four bedrooms. There are only a few luxury houses costing more than that. The price of the houses has gone up a lot in the last ten years and in the last two years it has{gone up by {fifteen per cent each year. There are not many new houses being built because most of the land is {Green Belt.
